items.ja: Can Arsenal's defence lead them to title glory?
items.en: Can Arsenal's defence lead them to title glory?
items.text_for_match: Can Arsenal's defence lead them to title glory? items.ja: What did we learn from Rohl's Rangers unveiling?
items.en: What did we learn from Rohl's Rangers unveiling?
items.text_for_match: What did we learn from Rohl's Rangers unveiling?
